price: E dissemos: "Faze cotas de malha e entrelaça bem as malhas, e fazei o bem. Por certo, do que fazeis, sou Onividente."
arabic: أَنِ ٱعۡمَلۡ سَٰبِغَٰتٖ وَقَدِّرۡ فِي ٱلسَّرۡدِۖ وَٱعۡمَلُواْ صَٰلِحًاۖ إِنِّي بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ بَصِيرٞ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: ani iʿ'mal sābighātin waqaddir fī al-sardi wa-iʿ'malū ṣāliḥan innī bimā taʿmalūna baṣīrun
